trans-unit.source: Converts objects to and from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Convertit des objets vers et à partir de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui fournit un contexte de format.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: Type à partir duquel effectuer la conversion.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert an object of the specified type to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Détermine si le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> peut convertir l'objet en type spécifié en une <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />, à l'aide du contexte déterminé.

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert the specified type to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: true si le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> peut convertir le type spécifié en un objet <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> ; sinon, false.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> peut convertir des types suivants à un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui fournit un contexte de format.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Type vers lequel effectuer la conversion.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Détermine si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> peut convertir une <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> dans le type spécifié.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to the specified type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> peut convertir un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> au type spécifié ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> method returns `true` if `destinationType` is <xref:System.String> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> méthode retourne `true` si `destinationType` est <xref:System.String> ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Dans le cas contraire, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> retourne `false`.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui fournit un contexte de format.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides the culture information that is used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui fournit les informations de culture utilisées pendant la conversion.

trans-unit.source: The object to convert to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Objet à convertir en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Convertit l'objet spécifié en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: Objet converti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> peut convertir des types suivants à un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to avoid throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: Appelez le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> méthode avant d’appeler le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> pour éviter de lever une exception.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> est <see langword="null" />.
– ou –

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> cannot be converted to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> ne peut pas être converti en objet <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui fournit un contexte de format.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides the culture information that is used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui fournit les informations de culture utilisées pendant la conversion.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to convert to another type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> à convertir en un autre type.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Type vers lequel effectuer la conversion.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to an object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Convertit le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> spécifié en un objet du type spécifié.

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: Objet converti.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to avoid throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: Appelez le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> méthode avant d’appeler le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> pour éviter de lever une exception.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is <paramref name="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> est <paramref name="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> est <see langword="null" />.
– ou –

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> n'est pas un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
